text: Other reviews are crazy. Great homemade pizza! Fresh bread sticks.  THE best wings ever. Great flavor slightly crispy.  Meat pizza is the best!  Also have great sandwiches.
Good pizza and very quick when ordered through pickup. Only complaint would be when not open the phone rings and rings versus having an answering machine stating they are closed.
Still the best pizza!! Brought back lots of childhood memories. Location was much different than their previous and was kind of odd, but overlook that and enjoy the pizza! Yum!
